title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Yahoo's Dan Wetzel about Roger Goodell's testimony in front of Congress yesterday. Steve Levy checks in to discuss the controversial call from Game 4 of the Stanley Cup playoffs. Doug Gottlieb joins the guys in-studio to preview tonight's NBA Draft.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Yahoo's Dan Wetzel about Roger Goodell's testimony in front of Congress yesterday. Steve Levy checks in to discuss the controversial call from Game 4 of the Stanley Cup playoffs. Doug Gottlieb joins the guys in-studio to preview tonight's NBA Draft.
